bilingual.source: The new policy is strikingly different from the old one.
bilingual.target: 新政策与旧政策显著地不同。

bilingual.source: The new policy was implemented analogously to the old one.
bilingual.target: 新政策类似地实施于旧政策。

bilingual.source: She is opposed to the new policy.

list.abstract: policy（英[ˈpɒləsi]，美[ˈpɑːləsi]），英语单词，名词，意思为政策；方针；保单。短语搭配有foreign policy（外交政策）。例句为“A welcomed policy for poor students.（一项受欢迎的贫困学生政策。）” policy相关名词近义词有deal、programm。复数为policies。

yingyinNormal.en: You can't let the campaign drive our foreign policy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不能让竞选决定外交政策。

yingyinNormal.en: America Works. Not just the policy, but the origins.
yingyinNormal.zh: 关于美国就业法案，并不只关于政策，还有它的起源。

yingyinNormal.en: If I don't win in Iowa, there is no foreign policy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我拿不下爱荷华，就没什么外交政策可言了。

yingyinNormal.en: But when you come to policy, let's not just consider economics.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但当你要制定政策的时候你就不能只考虑经济学了。

yingyinNormal.en: But relying instead solely on government policy，to decide how much currency to print.
yingyinNormal.zh: 完全凭借政府政策来决定货币发行量。

yingyinNormal.en: But relying instead solely on government policy，to decide how much currency to print.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而是完全凭借政府政策来决定货币发行量。

yingyinNormal.en: No matter the policy question, foreign or domestic, we hammer Dunbar's lack of experience.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不论是政策，国际或国内问题，我们都抨击邓巴经验不足。

yingyinNormal.en: I mean, Tusk should not be determining policy. The president alone should instruct you on what you are to pursue.
yingyinNormal.zh: Tusk怎么能参与政策？只有总统可以决定你该怎么做。

yingyinNormal.en: Now let's look at where we are in reality, recent headlines, in the media, include Foreign Policy magazine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那现在来看看，现实中我们的情况，媒体中最近的标题，包括外交政策杂志。

yingyinNormal.en: Governments even set policy by the curve, tolerating the inflation when they spent extra money creating jobs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 政府甚至根据这曲线拟定政策，在他们花大量的支出创造工作机会时会选择接受通货膨胀的出现。

yingyinNormal.en: Here's the thing, Colonel Lennox. We cannot entrust national security to teenagers, unless I missed the policy paper.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事情是这样的，兰诺克斯上校，我们不能把国家安全托付给年轻人，除非说有什么政策我不知道。

yingyinNormal.en: We could, but thanks to a new policy from your boss, only one of them is authorized to handle the ax. The rest of them can't even touch it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 本来是可以的，但多亏你的上司制定的新政策，只有一个人有权限使用斧头，其他人连碰都不能碰。

yingyinNormal.en: If it breached, he needs to be put down. That's the policy. Would it not be best for us to discover why first, Ms. Cullen? Please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果它违反规定，就要将其撤下，政策就是如此。对我们来说，先找出原因不是最好的吗，卡伦女士？请吧。

yingyinNormal.en: In fact, monetary policy is set by an independent Federal Reserve System, or The Fed, made up of 12 regional banks in major cities around the country.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上，货币政策是由独立的联邦准备系统制定，也就是联准会，其下有十二家区域银行散布在美国的各大都市。

yingyinNormal.en: In fact, monetary policy is set by an independent Federal Reserve System, or The Fed, made up of 12 regional banks in major cities around the country.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上，货币政策是由独立的联邦准备系统制定，也就是联准会，其下有十二家区域银行散布在美国的各大都市。

yingyinNormal.en: So when it comes to policy, when you want to answer questions the side issue you care about, we should think about the broader range, a broader picture, a broader perspective. And doesn't just think about the rational person.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当你要制定政策，当你要回答一些问题，你就要考虑一些细枝末节的问题，我们思考问题的范围应该更宽泛角度和视野也要更宽广我们不能只考虑理性的个人。。

yingyinNormal.en: Uniform policy for Kips Bay Creative Technology.
yingyinNormal.zh: 基普湾创新科技的着装规则

yingyinNormal.en: So which branch of our government sets this policy?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是哪个政府单位负责决策？

yingyinNormal.en: So which branch of our government sets this policy?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是哪个政府单位负责决策？

yingyinNormal.en: And as we discussed, the official school policy is abstinence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正像我们讨论过的，学校的规定是节欲。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

sense_info_list.en: a course or principle of action adopted or proposed by a government, party, business, or individual

examination_example.sentence: He reads so passionately that his parents have to institute a "no reading <highlight>policy</highlight>" at the dinner table.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的阅读热情如此之高，以至于他的父母不得不在餐桌上制定“禁止阅读政策”。

examination_example.sentence: Arizona had attempted to fashion state <highlight>policies</highlight> that ran parallel to the existing federal ones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 亚利桑那州曾试图制定与现有联邦政策平行的州政策。

examination_example.sentence: Mark Baldassare of the Public <highlight>Policy</highlight> Institute of California points out that much of the state's budget is patrolled by unions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加利福尼亚州政策研究院的Mark Baldassare指出，该州的大部分预算是由工会负责审查的。

examination_example.sentence: That's likely because the rural poor are using the money as makeshift insurance <highlight>policies</highlight> against inclement weather, Ferraro says.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 费拉罗说，这可能是因为农村贫困人口将这笔钱用作应对恶劣天气的临时保险单。

examination_example.sentence: My new company seems to employ a feedback <highlight>policy</highlight> that combines compassion and directness.

examination_example.sentence_trans: 不丹的喜马拉雅王国长期以来都有向游客收取每日费用的政策。

examination_example.sentence: The UK is set to adjust its <highlight>policy</highlight> on taxation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国将调整其税收政策。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 警察部队；警察；警方；警察部门；警察机构

word_family.mean: n. 政策；方针；保单；谨慎行为；权宜之举

sense_info_list.en: a course or principle of action adopted or proposed by a government; party; business; or individual

examination_example.sentence: A Japanese IT firm has officially introduced an "office cat" <highlight>policy</highlight> to combat the stressful environment of the workplace.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 日本一家信息技术公司正式推出“办公室猫”政策，以应对工作场所的紧张环境。

examination_example.sentence: For <highlight>policy</highlight>, we need to focus on options that make it easy for people to eat fewer calories.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在政策方面，我们需要关注那些能让人们更容易摄入更少卡路里的选项。

examination_example.sentence: Johns Hopkins' internal-medicine program adopted the same <highlight>policy</highlight> in 2011.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 约翰霍普金斯大学(Johns Hopkins)的内科项目在2011年采取了同样的政策。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 警察部队；警察；警方；警察部门；警察机构

word_family.mean: n. 政策；方针；保单；谨慎行为；权宜之举

sense_info_list.en: a course or principle of action adopted or proposed by a government, party, business, or individual

examination_example.sentence: Our government is looking for some ways，including the 3-child <highlight>policy</highlight> (政策) to deal with the problem of the aging population (人口老龄化).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的政府正在寻找一些办法，包括三孩政策来解决人口老龄化的问题。

examination_example.sentence: The government should take strict measures to carry out garbage sorting <highlight>policy</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 政府应采取严格措施实施垃圾分类政策。
